brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of (PN-152,243)/PN-196,444 in the Prevention of Thrombocytopenia
brief_summary: Intensive chemotherapy is associated with significant thrombocytopenia, often requiring platelet transfusion to maintain platelet counts. This investigational drug has demonstrated the ability to increase platelet counts. This study will test the safety and efficacy of an investigational drug in the prevention of thrombocytopenia in patients with high-risk sarcoma receiving AI (Adriamycin/Ifosfamide) chemotherapy.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Patients must be newly diagnosed with moderate or high-grade sarcoma and be receiving AI (Adriamycin/Ifosfamide) chemotherapy Exclusion Criteria: - Patients must not have active bleeding (exclusions do apply) or history of platelet disorder
